verses.name: Proverbs 24:18
verses.text: Lest the Lord see it, and it displease him, and he turn away his wrath from him.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:19
verses.text: Fret not thyself because of evil men, neither be thou envious at the wicked;

verses.name: Proverbs 24:20
verses.text: For there shall be no reward to the evil man; the candle of the wicked shall be put out.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:21
verses.text: My son, fear thou the Lord and the king: and meddle not with them that are given to change:

verses.name: Proverbs 24:22
verses.text: For their calamity shall rise suddenly; and who knoweth the ruin of them both?
